show.subtitle: Gary Null discusses progressive issues with some of the most remarkable minds in the world.
show.title: Progressive Commentary Hour

title: Greg Braden
content:
Greg Braden is an international recognized pioneer for almost 30 years in the dialogue to bring together ancient wisdom… m, modern spirituality and the insights of innovative science and discovery.
Greg and his work have been features on the History and Discovery channels and National Geographic.Earlier he was a successful computer geologist and systems designer having worked for Phillips Petroleum and was the first Technical Operations Manager for Cisco Systems.
 He is member of the Evolutionary Leadership think tank, which includes many individuals who listeners have heard frequently on this program such as Bruce Lipton, Elisabet Sahtouris, Ashok Gangadean, Erwin Laszlo and Joan Borysenko.

Gregg’s most recent release is “The Turning Point: Creating Resilience in a Time of Extremes” which explores the relationships and ways we can solve our critical problems at this time by the way we think of ourselves and our world. His website is GreggBraden.com
